page.title: 13RAUCEBY HOSPITAL
page.content:
{Rauceby}is a{mental hospital}which was built in l899. It has 415 beds but only 350 are usually occupied. Most male{nurses}wear grey suits.{Radio {Rauceby}is the radio service for the {hospital.}It has 3000 records and when not broadcasting live is tuned to Radio Lincolnshire. The hospital's future is uncertain. It may well close in the next ten years. There is a {school of nursing}at{Rauceby.
{Ash Villa}is the{hospital school}which cares for child patients aged 20 to 16. They do normal lessons until half past three. After that they play cards, or badminton before they go to bed. There are only 12 children in the school at present and they are taught by{specially trained teachers.
